revised_title: Population Analysis and Life Expectancy in the Netherlands
tldr: The author presents a detailed analysis of the population and life expectancy in the Netherlands, using data from birth and death records, and tables of assignable annuities. The study reveals the age distribution of the population, gender ratios, and the proportion of married individuals. The author also discusses the present value of annuities on lives and provides a table of mortality rates for various locations in the Netherlands and London.
